name: embedplayer
description: Generic jQuery API to control embedded videos

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/embedplayer.js src/dailymotion.js src/soundcloud.js src/vimeo.js src/youtube.js src/twitch.js src/html5.js -o dist/embedplayer.jquery.min.js --source-map dist/embedplayer.jquery.min.js.map --mangle
